En Saigón somos un equipo creativo dedic: At Saigón, we are a creative team devoted to casting design and production for local and global projects.
Nuestro enfoque se apoya en la dinámica: We are focused on the dynamic and wide array of options we offer for each project. To do so, we rely on a talent base of over 100,000 people that allows us to provide comprehensive casting services for fiction, advertising, graphic media, fashion, and special projects.
Siempre adaptandonos a los nuevos format: We are constantly adapting to new formats and adding new remote and in-person casting tools.
Creemos en el infinito potencial de la i: We believe in the endless possibilities offered by innovation.
Nos posicionamos como líderes en el merc: We lead the Argentine advertising market, reaching audiences worldwide.
Desde hace más de una década convertimos: For over a decade, we have brought the most diverse searches into life.
Nuestro abordaje es una invitación a des: Our approach is an invitation to discover and recruit talent with a novel horizon in each production.
La publicidad es una fuerza que nos impu: Advertising is our daily driving force.
Ideas y acción son los motores con los q: Ideas and action are what move us forward.
En nuestros casting fotográficos, cubrim: In our photography castings, we handle projects involving fashion, advertising, catalogs, social media, corporate, branding, and the entire field of graphic and digital media.
Nuestros fotógrafos trabajan optimizando: Our photographers optimize technical and creative resources to accomplish project goals.
Le ponemos los cuerpos los rostros a tus: We put bodies and faces to your ideas and projects.
Esta sección dedicada a los niños y adol: This area, devoted to children and teenagers, is the most challenging in terms of our results and discoveries in each new search.
Un espacio de juego donde el talento y e: A playful space where talent and charisma freely unfold.

Un espacio dedicado al diseño de casting: An area devoted to modern casting design and creative focus.
Cubrimos el medio audiovisual en su espe: We cover the most artistic aspect of audiovisual media: films, shows, TV, VO, music videos, art videos, fashion film, transmedia.
Componemos un mapa de acción para formar: We create a roadmap to form casts customized for each goal.
Damos relieve a las historias que nos to: We enhance the stories we are called to tell from acting and talent ensembles.
Enfocar la búsqueda, proponer opciones o: Focusing searches and proposing original and effective options are our top priority.
Vemos en los proyectos lo que nadie vio: We see what no one has yet seen in projects, later crystallizing them through our own, effective action.
La ficción en Saigón es nuestra nueva re: Fiction at Saigon becomes our new reality, driving all of our experience and passion.
Street Agency es nuestra agencia de cast: Street Agency is our street scouting agency focused on diversity.
Buscamos gente de todas las edades, etni: We search for people of all ages, ethnic groups, nationalities, cultures, genders, and backgrounds. We are interested in the most enticing and expressive profiles: diverse faces, bodies, and skills. But, above all, we search for real people in their natural environment because the street always harbors hidden, interesting and unknown talents. We are devoted to finding that potential and serving as a bridge between them and brands open to change.
Estamos convencidos de que la comunicaci: We are confident that communication is much more effective when true, real people are involved.
Gestionar carreras actorales es un punto: Managing acting careers is why we stand out and what is driving Saigón’s growth.
La meta central es propulsar el potencia: The core goal is to promote the potential of exclusive talent –both experienced and new actors– so they are available for roles and projects that are their perfect match.
Brindamos un servicio profesional dirigi: We provide professional services for casting directors, producers and filmmakers.
Actualizamos el intercambio entre nuestr: We keep the exchange between our actors and clients up to date for better communication, driving transformation in existing ways of work.
